short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: clear the cookies of current tab site or any other chosen domain

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Cleans the cookies of website with one click without going into browsers settings. useful when you have multiple accounts of same website or want to clear the traces of any website from your browser.
